CustomField.formula: IF( Analytics_Cloud_Amount__c = 0.00 && of_Analytics_Products__c >0 && TEXT( StageName )='Closed Won' && ISBLANK( AC_Original_Opportunity__c ) , 1, IF( Analytics_Cloud_Amount__c > 0.00 && of_Analytics_Products__c >0 && TEXT( StageName )='Closed Won' && ISBLANK( AC_Original_Opportunity__c ), 1, 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Trial Count
